Name: Replicated
About the game: Solve unique three dimensional puzzles set to calming music and refined visuals inspired by retro hardware. Make your way through the challenges and discover hidden levels to complete the game. Key Features 1 to 2 hours of gameplay with over 300 cubes to click on. 40+1 levels of uninterrupted fun. Every puzzle carefully put together to give the player the right amount of challenge. Colourful visuals inspired by retro hardware.
